scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:1234567890[call_number]@sha-it.mavenir.com SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE,UPDATE,OPTIONS,REFER,NOTIFY,CANCEL,BYE,ACK,PRACK Call-ID: caller[call_number]///[call_id] From: <[field0]>;tag=[pid]UEMO[call_number] To: <sip:1234567890[call_number]@sha-it.mavenir.com> CSeq: 1 INVITE Supported: 100rel,eventlist User-Agent: SIPP Content-Type: application/sdp P-Asserted-Identity: <[field0]> Contact: <[field0];transport=[transport]>;+g.3gpp.icsi-ref="urn%3Aurn-7%3A3gpp-service.ims.icsi.mmtel,urn%3Aurn-7%3A3gpp-service.ims.icsi.mmtel.gsma.videocall";audio;video;q=0.8;+g.oma.sip-im;+g.oma.sip-im.large-message Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=Mingle 1456964139 1456964139 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=msrp c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=message 22581 TCP/TLS/MSRP * a=sendonly a=accept-types:* a=accept-wrapped-types:* a=path:msrps://[local_ip]:22581/8V2aLr53kkElox9KMLn76i2SM40q3;tcp a=setup:active a=file-selector:name:"IMG_0299.PNG" type:image/* size:176419 hash:sha-1:CB:F2:EF:3D:DD:3C:BA:3D:21:6C:2F:A8:84:56:D4:48:83:6B:CB:D5 a=file-transfer-id:zFvmfp4CqKRi8SGWWwhQ4iXoPeqPrKT3 a=file-disposition:attachment a=file-range:1-176419

ACK [$2] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [routes] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:[field0];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
